Description_lang: There are few among the Knights of the Ebon Blade with more loyalty than Thassarian. His unwavering conviction and prowess in battle has earned him the respect of all within the order.
AuraDescription_lang: Thassarian is a frost death knight who uses dual runeblades and the power of frost to annihilate his enemies.

description_blz.en_US: There are few among the Knights of the Ebon Blade with more loyalty than Thassarian. His unwavering conviction and prowess in battle has earned him the respect of all within the order.
description_blz.es_MX: Existen pocos Caballeros de la Espada de Ébano más leales que Thassarian. Su convicción inquebrantable y sus habilidades en la batalla le hicieron ganar el respeto de todos en la orden.
description_blz.pt_BR: São poucos os Cavaleiros da Lâmina de Ébano mais leais do que Thassarian. Ele é dotado de convicção inabalável e de grande habilidade em batalha, que fizeram com que o cavaleiro conquistasse o respeito de todos os membros da ordem.
description_blz.de_DE: Es gibt nur wenige unter den Rittern der Schwarzen Klinge, die mehr Loyalität bewiesen haben als Thassarian. Seine standhafte Überzeugung und sein Kampfgeschick haben ihm den Respekt aller Ordensmitglieder eingebracht.
description_blz.en_GB: There are few among the Knights of the Ebon Blade with more loyalty than Thassarian. His unwavering conviction and prowess in battle has earned him the respect of all within the order.
description_blz.es_ES: Pocos caballeros de la Espada de Ébano hay más leales que Thassarian. Su convicción inquebrantable y su destreza en el combate le han granjeado el respeto de todos en la orden.
description_blz.fr_FR: Rares sont les chevaliers de la Lame d’ébène plus loyaux que Thassarian. Sa détermination inflexible et sa grande aptitude au combat lui ont valu le respect de tous les membres de l’ordre.
description_blz.it_IT: Pochi fra i Cavalieri della Spada d'Ebano sono leali come Thassarian. Le sue irreprensibili convinzioni e la sua ferocia in battaglia gli hanno fatto guadagnare il rispetto di chiunque all'interno dell'ordine.
description_blz.ru_RU: Тассариан – один из самых преданных рыцарей Черного Клинка. Своей непреклонной решимостью и мастерством в бою он завоевал уважение всего ордена.
description_blz.ko_KR: 칠흑의 기사단에서 가장 충성스러운 기사를 꼽으라면 타사리안을 빼놓을 수 없습니다. 그는 한결같은 소신과 전투 기술로 기사단 내에서 존경받고 있습니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 薩沙理安也是黯刃騎士團之中，最忠實的同伴之一。他那毫不動搖的信念和戰鬥時的勇氣，為他在組織中贏得眾人尊敬。
description_blz.zh_CN: 萨萨里安的忠诚在黑锋骑士团中无人可及。他毫不动摇的决心和战斗中展现出的技巧赢得了骑士团上下的一致尊敬。
